Name: Mao Group
description:
Mao is 36 years old. She is a widowed rice farmer and she has a small child in her care. Her one child attends school. Mao is pictured first from the right, and she has been a farmer since 2000. Mao lives in the rural village in the Prey Veng Province of Cambodia. Mao can earn approximately $1.5 per day.

Mao is the group leader and would like to request a loan as part of a group of five members. She will use her portion to buy piglets to fatten and earn additional income to improve her living standards. With this loan, she will be able to have enough money to buy piglets to fatten. In the future, she wants to buy more cows and pigs to fatten, and support her child to earn a higher education.
